attributes.action: There can only be a change of Prime Minister after a General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If any political party in power wishes to change it's leader & therefore the prime minister a General Election should take place to enable the country to pick it's Prime Minister & not just a few party members.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
